Flow.description: GTMS-20912 GTMS-21326 - As part of this added Assignment element for Email Input GTMS-22478: Updated as part of partner alignment project. GTMS-22483: Updated flow as part of Partner Application phase 2 CR Changes GTMS-25259: Removed Campaign to add field mapping in both lead fields Assignment elements on 11/12/24 GTMS-27402 - Changed the acknowledgment content in Partner Registration screen GTMS-28873 - Made 'Primary Goal in Partnering with Samsara' a required field GTMS-29592/GTMS-28940: restricting lead creation if the account already has one active user. GTMS-32182 - An error occurred with your "Partner Deal Registration Flow" flow

formulas.description: GTMS-26099: Created as part of Partners H1 project to map application Denied reason for inactive country
formulas.name: Denied_Reason_Formula
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(CONTAINS({!$Label.Acitve_Countries_List}, {!Input_LeadRecord.Country})), 'Country is not supported', IF( CONTAINS({!$Label.Non_Professional_Email_Domains},{!DomainFormula}), 'Email Domain Not Supported', null ) )

textTemplates.description: GTMS-22483: Created as part of Partner application phase 2 project to store the denied application tempate.
textTemplates.name: Denied_Application_Template
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


You are not eligible for the engagement with samsara.


Regards,

Samsara.

textTemplates.description: Created as part of Partner application phase 2 CR changes to send emails about terminated partner
textTemplates.name: Terminated_Partner_Template
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!Input_LeadRecord.FirstName} - thanks for your application! We appreciate your interest in the Samsara Partner Program. 


At this time, our records indicate "{!Get_Account_Record_Based_On_Domain.Name}" is no longer an active Partner in the Samsara Partner Program, though it may have been active at sometime in the past. 


We will review your request and follow up to either provide or collect more information as needed. Please anticipate 5-10 business days for an update.  


Thanks for your interest and patience. 


The Samsara Partners Team
